review: So, we bought this, as we have been without cable for over a year. We use Nexflix via gaming consoles, but, that is only on one TV. I bought this, as a solution to this issue. The device is dead simple to use. The controls on you phone, tablet, or laptop, are rudimentary: play, pause, rewind 10 minutes, or stop. Thats it. I have heard rumors of someone making an app more like a traditional controller, and that would be great. But, as to this device, it works quite well!
author: W. Reed

review: This is a neat device.  I have netflix on my 360 and use that primarily before, but after getting this I find I enjoy using chromecast from my phone.  Also I watch a lot more youtube videos with this, Since there is no easy interface for youtube on my other devices I use this a lot.  Really good quality.The only things I have against it are that you have to go to each app to access the apps.  I find there should be a more unified interface that you can access on the phone that mirrors a chromecast interface, similar to (I know I just have to say it) apple tv.  If and when they come out iwth more apps for it, I don't want to have to download a bunch of different apps to access content.Also it could be speedier.  I have a nice home internet connection but sometimes there is drastic delay between my phone and the tv.Other than that is is a device that has a wonderful price, and a lot of potential.
